# AutomaticLabeledContentStyle

**Structure**

The default labeled content style.

## Declaration

```swift
struct AutomaticLabeledContentStyle
```

## Overview

Use [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/LabeledContentStyle/automatic] to construct this style.

## Creating the labeled content style

- **init()**: Creates an automatic labeled content style.

## Conforms To

- LabeledContentStyle
